Docs.summary: The for training a linear regression model using Online Gradient Descent (OGD) for estimating the parameters of the linear regression model.
Docs.remarks: Stochastic gradient descent uses a simple yet efficient iterative technique to fit model coefficients using error gradients for convex loss functions. Online Gradient Descent (OGD) implements the standard (non-batch) SGD, with a choice of loss functions, and an option to update the weight vector using the average of the vectors seen over time (averaged argument is set to True by default).
